entry.title: x-threads/x-zen: x-zen is a minimalist, lightweight and modular typescript framework inspired by NestJS, designed to build scalable backend applications with decorators, dependency injection and modular architecture.
entry.content: x-zen is a minimalist, lightweight and modular typescript framework inspired by NestJS, designed to build scalable backend applications with decorators, dependency injection and modular architecture.

entry.title: gwblocks/popup: A lightweight, dependency-free popup block built for the WordPress block editor (FSE compatible). Uses native blocks like Button for triggering, and keeps layout clean, accessible, and native to Gutenberg.
entry.content: A lightweight, dependency-free popup block built for the WordPress block editor (FSE compatible). Uses native blocks like Button for triggering, and keeps layout clean, accessible, and native to Gutenberg.

entry.title: noureddineouafy/silana-lite-ofc: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.
entry.content: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. Lightweight and efficient, it enhances personal and group chats with customizable plugins and seamless automation for a smarter messaging experience.

entry.title: AmaanMultani/lite-debounce-js: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟
entry.content: LiteDebounce is a lightweight utility for debouncing JavaScript functions, designed to improve performance without any dependencies. It offers both leading and trailing execution options, making it ideal for handling user inputs and optimizing event performance. 🐙🌟

entry.title: ratul3429/bun-microservice-gateways: This repository provides a fast and configurable gateway using Bun, designed to route HTTP requests to your microservices efficiently. With features like smart routing and built-in health checks, it simplifies local development and lightweight setups. 🐙🚀
